content:
Russian troops continue to terrorize Kherson. In the morning, explosions are heard in the regional center.

About thisreportedHead of Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin.

According to him, one of the "arrivals" is on an office building located in the central part of the city.

“Also, an explosive wave beat the windows in the house located nearby. Only the miracle of the woman who lives there was not injured, ”said Alexander Proudin.

As reported by the Armyinform, the enemy continuesAttach the civilian population of Kherson region: There are wounded.
title: In Kherson from the morning there are explosions: a crushed office building
description: This was reported by the head of Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin. According to him, one ...
author: Army Inform
